unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!**
normalised: Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!

unnormalised: Namaste, petrolheads! The Indian auto market is sizzling with launches hotter than a Chennai summer. Dr. Reddy, CEO of Mahindra, just unveiled the all-new ‘Scorpio N’ at their Chakan plant. Initial reviews are calling it a game-changer.
normalised: Namaste, petrolheads! The Indian auto market is sizzling with launches hotter than a Chennai summer. Doctor Reddy, Chief Executive Officer of Mahindra, just unveiled the all-new ‘Scorpio N’ at their Chakan plant. Initial reviews are calling it a game-changer.

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! Tata Motors launched the 'Punch EV' – their electric micro-SUV, promising a range of 300+ km on a single charge. Perfect for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams, right?
normalised: But wait, there's more! Tata Motors launched the 'Punch E V' – their electric micro-Sport Utility Vehicle, promising a range of three hundred plus kilometer on a single charge. Perfect for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams, right?

unnormalised: And Maruti Suzuki isn't sleeping either! They showcased the updated 'Brezza' with more features than you can shake a stick at. Sources say its sunroof is bigger than my balcony (approximately 100 sq ft!).
normalised: And Maruti Suzuki isn't sleeping either! They showcased the updated 'Brezza' with more features than you can shake a stick at. Sources say its sunroof is bigger than my balcony (approximately one hundred square feet!).

unnormalised: Expect price wars, folks! Initial estimates for the Scorpio N are around Rs. 12 Lakhs, while the Punch EV starts a bit higher. Buckle up; it's going to be a wild ride! Stay tuned for detailed reviews and comparisons coming soon! Happy driving!
normalised: Expect price wars, folks! Initial estimates for the Scorpio N are around rupees twelve lakh, while the Punch E V starts a bit higher. Buckle up; it's going to be a wild ride! Stay tuned for detailed reviews and comparisons coming soon! Happy driving!
